Header: Pompeo arrives in Tokyo ahead of North Korea visit
Content: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo arrived in Tokyo ahead of his visit to North Korea this weekend for talks with the country’s leader Kim Jong Un. In Tokyo Pompeo will meet with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and his Japanese counterpart Taro Kono later this evening. Pompeo’s visit to North Korea comes ahead of a planned second summit between Kim and President Donald Trump. The invitation to return to Pyongyang was made during a meeting with North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho on the sidelines of their United Nations General Assembly last week.
